DOC.brief_summary: The purpose project determine acceptability , feasibility , preliminary efficacy HIV prevention behavioral intervention ( Proyecto SOL ) reduce behavior associate HIV acquisition among Hispanic men sex men ( HMSM ) . The primary goal intervention motivate assist participant form carry `` Safer Options Life '' plan , thereby reduce risk HIV acquisition transmission .
DOC.brief_title: Proyecto SOL : A Risk Reduction Intervention Hispanic Men Who Have Sex With Men ( MSM )
DOC.criteria: selfidentify Hispanic Latino ; 18 49 year age ; resident South Florida ( MiamiDade , Broward Palm Beach county ) plan move area next 9 month ; selfidentify male ; least one episode unprotected anal sex man precede 3 month ; 2 male sex partner precede 3 month ; HIV negative unknown serostatus ; speak English and/or Spanish ; provide informed consent . previously participate Phase study ; selfidentify transgender ; resident South Florida .
